Info Source: https://www.sec.gov/litigation/admin/2017/34-79753.pdf

Description: Retaliation; age discrimination. After the verdict the parties reached an confidential settlement on legal fees.
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/articles/1023764

Private Litigation Case Title: Mario Zamarripa v. Mondelez Global LLC, et al
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/articles/1123450/mondelez-sales-reps-reach-1-5m-settlement-in-wage-row

Description: The CFTC announced that it had gotten a federal court to order Kraft and Mondelez to pay a total of $16 million in a case involving manipulation of the wheat market. The announcement did not indicate how much each company would pay. Here we assume the total was split evenly between them. The press release about the case was removed from the CFTC website. Here we cite an archived version on the Nexis information service.
Info Source: Kraft and Mondelez Global to Pay $16 Million in Wheat Manipulation Case, Targeted News Service, August 15, 2019 (via Nexis).

Description: The California Attorney General, eleven District Attorneys and the nonprofit Center for Environmental Health announced a settlement with food industry giant Mondelez International, Inc., formerly Kraft Foods, for selling ginger snap cookies containing lead in excess of California limits without the warning required by California's Proposition 65.
Info Source: https://www.oag.ca.gov/news/press-releases/attorney-general-kamala-d-harris-announces-settlement-mondel%C4%93z-international-inc

Description: The Santa Cruz County District Attorney's Office, through its Consumer Fraud Unit, in conjunction with nine other California District Attorneys, the California Attorney General, and the non-profit Center for Environmental Health, reached a settlement with food industry giant Mondelez International, Inc., formerly Kraft Foods, for selling ginger snap cookies in excess of California lead limits without a warning. The settlement was also announced by the California Attorney General; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/ca-mondelez-international-inc
Info Source: https://datinternet.co.santa-cruz.ca.us/Portals/24/pdfs/press/2016/01-22-16%20da%20press%20release%20-%20settlement%20with%20mondelez%20international%20inc.%20formerly%20kraft%20foods.pdf
